question: Many elderly people are no longer looked after by their families but are put in care homes. what are the advantages and disadvantages of this trend?
text: In the contemporary world, it is  a modern fashion trait to send old-aged people to elderly homes without looking after them at home. Although they get a sufficient amount of  love, care, attention from there equal age friends , they will ultimately miss cherished moments they spend while they were at home. This essay will elaborate on the merits and the drawbacks of this new trend.

Firstly and foremost, with the modernisation of the world,many people are busy with  their jobs and most of them barely have a spare to spend with there parents , considering , this time issue it is a wise decision for the aged parents to move into a nursing home rather feeling lonely and alone in their rooms, however, in elderly care they will be able to meet many colleagues of their own age. Most of the senior-citizens enjoy staying under the care of elderly homes since they will get time to play indoor and outdoor games, to participate in competitions arranged by these centres and so on unlike just sitting on a big couch and watching TV entire day  to kill time.To cite an example, Senior singing competitions are the most popular events arranged in between elderly care centres. Thus,  these grey-haired people fascinate their times in senior homes since they collect a plentiful of memories and moments.

On the flip side, it was a cultural value to look after parents once they grow old, unlike, those days, nowadays, many children do not want to care for their parents when they are matured to get rid of them they send them off to elderly care, this will make these grey-haired people  miss their lives they previously spend at home. Nevertheless, this will not only influence  the aged people but the grandkids will be strongly affected by the absence of their grandparents since they will miss the stories recited by grandparents.Alternatively , many aged people are suffering from illnesses since they do not have a peaceful inner mind they will always cling to the memories of their children and sadly suffer.Hence, children should think twice before sending their parents to nursing care.

To conclude, it has become a habit to accumulate senior-citizens under elderly care. The biggest affirmative of this way is that they will get ends to enjoy their time with while the lofty drawback is that they will be psychological unfit by always thinking about their kids.
